word: das Abschicken, die There is no plural form for "das abschicken" as it is an uncountable noun.
definition: To send or dispatch something, typically used when referring to the action of submitting or forwarding a document, message, or package to a recipient.

examples.german: Bitte abschicken Sie das Formular bis morgen.
examples.english: Please submit the form by tomorrow.
We need to send the order.
